to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Hello...
body:
Spie Sutherland wrote:
> In linux you could do echo "hello" > /dev/tty0 or cat file.txt > /dev/tty0

       Duh!  Jeez, I've been using Windows too long.  If 
I can `cat file > /dev/dsp` to test the audio card...  Thanks for the 
rock upside the head.  I need them. 

         Michael
